rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 4 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:46 PM, 22 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan and Tarlac within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Nueva Ecija(Carranglan, Lupao, San Jose, Pantabangan), Bulacan(San Miguel, San Ildefonso, Dona Remedios Trinidad, San Rafael, Baliuag, Bustos, Angat, Pandi, Santa Maria, Norzagaray, San Jose del Monte, Marilao, Meycauayan, Obando), Pampanga(Candaba, San Luis, San Simon, Apalit), Metro Manila(Valenzuela, Malabon, Navotas, Caloocan, Quezon City, Manila), Quezon(General Nakar, Real, Infanta, Atimonan, Mauban, Perez), Rizal(Tanay, Jala-Jala, Pililla), Laguna(Santa Maria, Pakil, Pangil, Mabitac), Batangas(Lipa, Mataasnakahoy, Balete, San Jose, Nasugbu), Cavite(Maragondon, Magallanes, General Emilio Aguinaldo, Alfonso, Indang, Ternate) and Zambales(San Marcelino, Botolan, Cabangan, San Antonio, San Narciso, San Felipe, Subic) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
